original_text: The people must not eat any of the new grain until they have given their gift to God. They and their children must do this now and always. They must do it in any place that they live.
korean_text: 너희는 너희 하나님께 예물을 가져오는 그 날까지 떡이든지 볶은 곡식이든지 생 이삭이든지 먹지 말지니 이는 너희가 거주하는 각처에서 대대로 지킬 영원한 규례니라

sentences.original_text: The people must not eat any of the new grain
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들은 새 곡식을 먹어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: until they have given their gift to God
They and their children must do this
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 그들의 자녀들은 이것을 행해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: in any place that they live
